text: "You Shook Me All Night Long" is a 1980 song by Australian hard rock band AC/DC and is the leading single from their seventh studio album Back in Black. It is the first single to feature Brian Johnson following the death of Bon Scott. It went to number 19 in Ireland, number 29 in France and Germany, number 35 in the United States and number 38 in the United Kingdom. In 2012 it went to number 49 in Australia. == References == Category:1980 songs Category:AC/DC songs Category:Celine Dion songs Category:Anastacia songs Category:Shania Twain songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: You Shook Me All Night Long
